name: Dropdown and scrollable Text
author: Pedram Nasertorabi

sections.description:
create shortcode for dropdown text or scrollable text with 24 theme.
Just install and go to DST option Page.
Use shortcode generator for create your scrollable or dropdown text and use it anywhere
sections.installation:
This plugin can be installed directly from your site.

Log in and navigate to Plugins
Add New.
Type Dropdown and scrollable Text into the Search and hit Enter.
Locate the Dropdown and scrollable Text plugin in the list of search results and click Install Now.
Once installed, click the Activate link.

It can also be installed manually.

Download the Dropdown and scrollable Text plugin from WordPress.org.
Unzip the package and move to your plugins directory.
Log into WordPress and navigate to the Plugins screen.
Once installed, click the Activate link.
sections.changelog:

  • Fix security issues
  • fix small bug

2.0

  • Add Easy shortcode generator and option panel
